title: Mesa’s NVK Open-Source Vulkan Driver for NVIDIA Hardware Is Now Stable
description:
The NVK open-source Vulkan graphics driver for NVIDIA hardware in the Mesa graphics stack is no longer experimental and it's now ready for prime time.

The post Mesa’s NVK Open-Source Vulkan Driver for NVIDIA Hardware Is Now Stable appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Distrobox 1.7 Improves NVIDIA Support, Wolfi Containers, and Adds New Flags
description:
Distrobox 1.7 tool for running any Linux distro inside a terminal emulator is now available for download with various new features and improvements. Here's what's new!

The post Distrobox 1.7 Improves NVIDIA Support, Wolfi Containers, and Adds New Flags appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Kali Linux 2024.1 Penetration Testing Distro Is Here with Linux 6.6 LTS, New Look
description:
Kali Linux 2024.1 ethical hacking and penetration testing distribution is now available for download with a fresh new look and feel, new tools, and a new kernel.

The post Kali Linux 2024.1 Penetration Testing Distro Is Here with Linux 6.6 LTS, New Look appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: KDE Neon Distro Now Ships with the KDE Plasma 6 Desktop Environment
description:
The latest stable KDE neon distribution release is now available for download with the KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment, as well as the KDE Gear 24.02 and KDE Frameworks 6 software suites.

The post KDE Neon Distro Now Ships with the KDE Plasma 6 Desktop Environment appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: KDE Plasma 6 Desktop Environment Officially Released, This Is What’s New
description:
KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment, as well as KDE Gear 24.02 and KDE Frameworks 6 software suites are now available with many new features and improvements. Here's what's new!
